metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1432 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The message_options function in includes/ucp/ucp_pm_options.php in phpBB before 3.0.13 does not properly validate the form key, which allows remote attackers to conduct CSRF attacks and change the full folder setting via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1432` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpbb3 - 3.0.12-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
phpbb3-l10n - 3.0.12-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: phpbb3 package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.0.12-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
